Simple Multiply Documentation 

============================= 

 

Welcome to the Simple Multiply program documentation. 

 

Quick Example 

------------- 

 

.. code-block:: python 

 

   from src.simple_multiply import multiply 

    

   result = multiply(5, 3) 

   print(result)  # Output: 15.0 

 

API Reference 

------------- 

 

.. automodule:: src.simple_multiply 

   :members: 

   :undoc-members: 

   :show-inheritance:
